description: Surveys of low-lying herbaceous and/or woody vegetation.

elements.description: Site within which the subplot is located. Used to filter out plots located outside of the selected site.
elements.label: Filter: Site

elements.description: Plot in which the vegetation survey is being made.
elements.label: Plot

elements.description: Is the survey made within a subplot?
elements.label: Survey Within a Subplot?

elements.description: A list of names of people responsible for the tree survey. The primary surveyor should be listed first.
elements.label: Surveyed By

elements.description: The date when the tree survey was made.
elements.label: Date Surveyed

elements.description: Comments or notes about the surveying event.
elements.label: Event Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.description: Audio comments about the surveying event.
elements.label: Audio Remarks

elements.description: Photos of the sampled vegetation at the plot level.
elements.label: Vegetation Photos: Plot

elements.description: The checklist used to provide the scientific name of the taxon.
elements.label: Taxon Checklist

elements.description: Filter the VASCAN database based on geographical distribution by selecting ONE region (e.g. Canadian province). Can be combined with growth form filter.
elements.label: VASCAN Filter: Geography

elements.description: Filter VASCAN database based by selecting ONE particular growth form. Can be combined with geography filter.
elements.label: VASCAN Filter: Growth Form

elements.description: A group of vascular plants considered by taxonomists to form a homogeneous unit, based on the VASCAN database.
elements.label: VASCAN Taxon

elements.description: A group of bryphoytes considered by taxonomists to form a homogeneous unit, based on the Bryoquel database.
elements.label: Bryoquel Taxon

elements.description: A group of organisms considered by taxonomists to form a homogeneous unit,  whose taxon is not available in VASCAN or other taxonomic checklists accessible within Fulcrum.
elements.label: Generic Taxon

elements.description: Photos showing the taxon.
elements.label: Taxon Photos

elements.description: Comments or notes about the taxon, or its identification.
elements.label: Taxon Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.description: Scientific name of the taxon. List auto-populated from the list of taxa available at the plot level.
elements.label: Scientific Name

elements.description: Percentage (%) of the plot area occupied by foliage.
elements.label: Canopy Cover (%)

elements.description: Comments or notes about the cover estimate.
elements.label: Cover Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.description: Subplot in which the vegetation survey is being made.
elements.label: Subplot

elements.description: Scientific name of the taxon. List auto-populated from the list of taxa available at the plot level.
elements.label: Scientific Name

elements.description: Percentage (%) of the subplot area occupied by foliage.
elements.label: Canopy Cover (%)

elements.description: Comments or notes about the cover estimate.
elements.label: Cover Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

name: Vegetation Surveys: Herbs and Shrubs

status_field.description: Status of record. Record first requires verification. Once verified, it can be submitted for approval; this locks the record for standard users. If approved, the record eventually gets published. If rejected, it goes back to standard users for further verification.
status_field.label: Record Status
